channel.title: Help
channel.description: how do i start the sever in the first place? it says it needs to be on how do i turn it on if i did not make it yet?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @poopketty777 poopketty777
item.description:
@poopketty777 wrote:

[quote=“blk joe12, post:7, topic:318284”]yes all you gotta do is go to the server downloads section pick a server you really like either 317,508,525 etc. and download it ( you might want to also download a client that goes along with it) now you cant just leech tht source you have to work in it you have to change thing and you can by modifying some of the documents well mainly client.java well yeah just go to server downloads section on home page and choose one l it and run it. make sure you have portfowarded though.[/quote]ok

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @blk_joe12 blk joe12
item.description:
@blk_joe12 wrote:

yes all you gotta do is go to the server downloads section pick a server you really like either 317,508,525 etc. and download it ( you might want to also download a client that goes along with it) now you cant just leech tht source you have to work in it you have to change thing and you can by modifying some of the documents well mainly client.java well yeah just go to server downloads section on home page and choose one l it and run it. make sure you have portfowarded though.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“iKapa, post:5, topic:318284”][quote author=poopketty777 link=topic=414767.msg3053217#msg3053217 date=1260236882]

what source/server you using?
[/quote] wat do u mean by that

A source is basically the code that the server uses to get information about where things should be etc.[/quote]

when people say source, they mean, what server are they using.
when people say base, they mean, what kind of server is it, delta etc.
when people say what version is it, they mean, 317, 377,474,508,525 etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

First download a source from the MoparScape downloads section. Recommended 317, or 508. Then, after you have downloaded that source, open the source files until you see atleast one of any files below:

Start.cmd
Run.cmd
RunServer.cmd
StartServer.cmd
startserv.cmd
runserv.cmd

Then click on one of the above to start it under the default Port it’s configured to.

Read full topic
